waivers.name: TikTok-Somali Economic Inefficiency
waivers.reason: Apify batch scraping costs $1.00/1K comments but ~67% are emoji-only and filtered locally. Current yield: 82.4% linguistic content. Pipeline approved with current approach while evaluating: (1) Scaling to more videos for better ROI, or (2) Apify Comments Analyzer for pre-filtering. Status: Monitoring cost per linguistic comment ($0.0012) as KPI.

waivers.name: Wikipedia-Somali Low Pass Rate
waivers.reason: Encyclopedia content naturally has higher filtering rate due to article structure and formatting. Current rate: 64.2%
